originalText.text:
I was referred to Dr. Blaufarb from my orthopedic surgeon at Mount Sinai before I had neck surgery.

He wanted me to have an EKG.

So I have been seeing Dr. Blaufarb since 2017.

He is very thorough and always making sure that you are getting the best care you can!

He is very competent, capable and compassionate!

My husband has been going to him also and we have referred friends to him

Everyone has the same thoughts on him.

He works so hard. He contacts you after hours and on weekends! He is so dedicated. It's so hard to find that kind of care!

He is a fabulous cardiologist and is always concerned about your condition and I highly recommend if you haven't been to a cardiologist that you go to him and get checked out!

He has done so many things for my husband and myself to ensure we have the best quality of life we can!

Simply the best!

originalText.text: I like honesty and an open demeanor. Dr. Ira Blaufarb shared this with me. He might be a bit old school, but his approach is appreciated and welcomed.
